Description:
The FHIR DocumentReference resource describes information about a document.

Read interactions typically begin with a client having previously established a relationship, often through querying for DocumentReference resources through the search interaction.
SampleResponse:
{

"resourceType": "DocumentReference",

"id": "eeFpluqNp7Shf.jP.KW4K1xMLcijrg6l1Zv.xiOHz.1Y3",

"status": "current",

"docStatus": "final",

"type": {

"coding": [

{

"system": "http://loinc.org",

"code": "11506-3",

"display": "Progress Note"

},

{

"system": "urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.4.737880.5010",

"code": "1",

"display": "Progress Notes"

}

],

"text": "Progress Note"

},

"category": [{

"coding": [{

"system": "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-documentreference-category",

"code": "clinical-note",

"display": "Clinical Note"

}],

"text": "Clinical Note"

}],

"subject": {

"reference": "Patient/e7XZi7JJ6AZSxlmZBc9-Rdw3",

"display": "Fhir D Cds Jr., DDS"

},

"date": "2019-05-21T20:19:30Z",

"author": [{

"reference": "Practitioner/e1iKCKct1N3beTTPAUSJN7A3",

"display": "User, Epic, RPh"

}],

"content": [{"attachment": {

"contentType": "text/html",

"url": "Binary/ekAJmRWsOeeVsqjgMnmX-5ZTCqyW.NZW3fvSH8mNXZSg3"

}}],

"context": {

"encounter": [{"reference": "Encounter/eUYzqPWXxEvtcwrItyp7H3xYs37qc3b3dYZln86UIj.43"}],

"period": {"start": "2019-05-21T04:59:00Z"}

}

}

DocumentReference.Name: DocumentReference
DocumentReference.Description: An instance of the R4 DocumentReference resource.

authenticator.Name: authenticator
authenticator.Description: Who or what authenticated the document.

author.Name: author
author.Description: Who or what authored the document.

attachment.Name: attachment
attachment.Description: Absolute reference to Binary FHIR resource in Content.attachment.content

url.Name: url
url.Description: The URI where the data can be found.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The context of the document content.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The time of the service that is being documented.

related.Name: related
related.Description: A reference to the Observation FHIR resource that contains the SmartData element.

date.Name: date
date.Description: When this document reference was created.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: The note identifier from the Epic system.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient that is the subject of the note.

type.Name: type
type.Description:
The note type.

Can be in the format:

  • code= Note Type value from category list
  • system=customer-specific oid for category list
  • For example: "urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.0.1.7.4.737880.5010"

Otherwise, can be mapped using a core set of the Epic-released category values to LOINC codes:

  • code="10164-2"
  • system="https://loinc.org/"
